title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ryan Girdusky & Ric Grenell | 6/4/21
description:
Ryan Girdusky, author of "They’re Not Listening," calls in to discuss his new 1776 Project PAC that will support school board candidates who are fighting against critical race theory. Former Acting Director of National Intelligence Richard Grenell shares his insight on the increase in foreign cyberattacks. Patty Hidalgo Menders, a mother suing a Virginia school board over equity programs, calls in to share what sparked her to take legal action.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Ryan Girdusky, author of "They’re Not Listening," calls in to discuss his new 1776 Project PAC that will support school board candidates who are fighting against critical race theory. Former Acting Director of National Intelligence Richard Grenell shares his insight on the increase in foreign cyberattacks. Patty Hidalgo Menders, a mother suing a Virginia school board over equity programs, calls in to share what sparked her to take legal action.
